statements: SELECT * FROM sensor_data;
SELECT device_id, temperature, humidity FROM sensor_data WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT id, temperature, humidity, timestamp FROM sensor_data WHERE humidity > 50 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_id, soil_moisture FROM sensor_data WHERE humidity < 30 ORDER BY device_id ASC;
SELECT MAX(temperature) AS max_temperature, MIN(humidity) AS min_humidity FROM sensor_data;
SELECT id, device_id, temperature FROM sensor_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE humidity > 50 AND temperature < 25 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT device_id, AVG(temperature) AS avg_temp, AVG(humidity) AS avg_humidity FROM sensor_data GROUP BY device_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 100;
SELECT sensor_data.*, COUNT(*) OVER (PARTITION BY device_id) AS total_entries FROM sensor_data;
SELECT device_id, MAX(temperature) AS max_temp, MIN(temperature) AS min_temp FROM sensor_data GROUP BY device_id HAVING MAX(temperature) - MIN(temperature) > 5;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT device_id, temperature FROM sensor_data WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY device_id ASC;
SELECT device_id, humidity FROM sensor_data WHERE humidity < 50 ORDER BY humidity DESC;
SELECT device_id, temperature, humidity FROM sensor_data WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT device_id, location FROM device_info WHERE status = TRUE ORDER BY device_id ASC;
SELECT id, device_id, temperature, humidity, timestamp FROM sensor_data WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT device_id, temperature, humidity FROM sensor_data WHERE humidity < 50 ORDER BY humidity ASC, temperature DESC;
SELECT device_id, location, status FROM device_info WHERE status = true ORDER BY device_id;
SELECT device_id, location FROM device_info WHERE location LIKE '%Room%' ORDER BY device_id DESC;
SELECT id, device_id, temperature, humidity, timestamp FROM sensor_data WHERE device_id = '001' ORDER BY timestamp ASC, temperature DESC;
SELECT * FROM Sensors WHERE location = 'Lab A';
SELECT sensor_name, sensor_type FROM Sensors WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Devices;
SELECT device_name FROM Devices WHERE location = 'Office';
SELECT MAX(value), MIN(value) FROM Readings WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Sensors WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_name, location FROM Sensors WHERE device_id = 2 AND sensor_type = 'Humidity' ORDER BY sensor_name ASC;
SELECT device_name, COUNT(sensor_id) AS sensor_count FROM Devices JOIN Sensors ON Devices.device_id = Sensors.device_id GROUP BY device_name ORDER BY sensor_count DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT sensor_type FROM Sensors WHERE location = 'Room A' AND sensor_id IN (SELECT sensor_id FROM Readings WHERE value > 50);
SELECT sensor_name, value, unit FROM Sensors JOIN Readings ON Sensors.sensor_id = Readings.sensor_id WHERE sensor_type = 'Pressure' ORDER BY timestamp ASC, value DESC;
SELECT * FROM Sensors WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature';
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, location FROM Sensors WHERE location = 'Kitchen' ORDER BY sensor_id DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, reading, timestamp FROM Readings WHERE value > 50 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM Devices WHERE device_type = 'Thermostat';
SELECT * FROM Locations WHERE latitude < 40 AND longitude > -100;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, timestamp FROM Sensors WHERE reading > 50 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM Devices WHERE device_type = 'Temperature' AND device_name LIKE 'Thermo%' ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT device_id, device_name, location_name FROM Devices JOIN Locations ON Devices.device_id = Locations.location_id WHERE latitude < 0 ORDER BY device_id;
SELECT location_name, AVG(latitude), AVG(longitude) FROM Locations GROUP BY location_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 2 ORDER BY AVG(latitude) DESC;

SELECT r.sensor_id, r.timestamp, r.value, s.sensor_type, s.location FROM Readings r JOIN Sensors s ON r.sensor_id = s.sensor_id WHERE r.value < 20 AND s.sensor_type IN ('Temperature', 'Pressure') ORDER BY r.timestamp;
SELECT * FROM sensors
SELECT sensor_id, location, temperature FROM sensors WHERE humidity > 50
SELECT device_id, location, humidity FROM sensors WHERE temperature < 25 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT location, temperature FROM sensors WHERE device_id = 2 ORDER BY location ASC
SELECT sensor_id, temperature, humidity FROM sensors WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp <= '2022-06-01'
SELECT * FROM sensors WHERE temperature > 30 AND humidity < 40 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT sensor_id, location FROM sensors WHERE device_id = 1 ORDER BY sensor_id ASC
SELECT device_id, COUNT(*) AS num_sensors FROM sensors GROUP BY device_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 3
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM sensors WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity > 50
SELECT device_id, AVG(temperature) AS avg_temp FROM sensors GROUP BY device_id ORDER BY avg_temp DESC
